attributes.action: Allow anyone in education free bus and train travel to and from school/college!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no way to actually get free bus or train travel to and from college and with the prices being increasingly high it is becoming harder and harder to pay for travel. The prices are getting ridiculous and needs something doing to it...!

rejection.details: This petition already exists. You may wish to add your name to the live petition, which can be found at: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/freestudentpt/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
